main.subHeader: Pnyx is a text discussion tool built upon graph, for people who is seeking static and persistent space to host deep and meaningful discussion.

copywrite.paragraph2: Discussion are crucial. It sparks brilliant and novel ideas. It leverages the best part of us and share with others by default. It feels great when discuss with someone about the topic you are interested in.
copywrite.paragraph3: No matter what perspective we have, though discussion we may reach some standpoint we share together.
copywrite.paragraph4: But discussion now seems to be shallow and fragmented, it steadily becomes something to let us browse through rather than something to think and engage.
copywrite.paragraph5: It is filled with fake information and polarized messages, its quantity surpasses its quality, it becomes hard to organize and eroded by new content day by day. It lost the space to cultivate insightful ideas.
copywrite.paragraph6: Discuss on the internet feel like swim in a very small and dirty pond with no fresh water enter.
copywrite.paragraph7: Social media, online forums, message tools, communication tools. They are not good at operating a good discussion. They are hard to see the whole picture. In the meanwhile, the flow on these platform is too fast to brew. People are constantly distracted by new content.
copywrite.paragraph8: But we are still looking forward to have a great discussion, though internet, though connection. To share ideas, to spark genius, to interact with each other in a deep manner.
copywrite.paragraph9: It's time to re-image, re-think, re-do the software for wonderful discussions.

howItWorks.header: Take every conversation as whole picture
howItWorks.subHeader: Graph is powerful tool for discussion, it leverages everyone to involve into the dicussion deeper

one.title: Create a public or private pynx and invite people in.
one.content: Everyone can participate in public pynx and it will show up at pynx official website. Once pynx set to private, only whom are invited though customize url can join.

two.title: Write down what you think just as before.
two.content: And we will take every comment as a node and display it on the graph we called “Hologram”. And when you go down a layer we will draw a line between the child and its parent to let everyone know the discussion had been deeper.

three.title: Reference anything when you needed.
three.content: Copy and paste any external url when you want to reference it, Pnyx will automatically recognize it and draw dashed line between comment and reference on Hologram. In the meanwhile it will also store all the reference at the same place for searching or tracking. You can also reference the comment in this discussion.

four.title: Archive whole discussion for future.
four.content: Once you finish the discussion or want to temporary close it, you can archive the discussion. It can act like static website for public usage or private archive for yourself.

features.subHeader: Discuss in text is a powerful way to gain insight, it non-realtime feature provide us space for great ideas.

one.title: Graph centered experience
one.content: Different from traditional listing structure, we rearrange discussion in graph. With the graph we called 'Hologram' you can have the whole picture of this discussion.

two.title: Real-time or not, in your control
two.content: Real-time conversation has double-edge, it may benefit you at some situation but will shrink the space for cultivating brilliant idea. This is in your control, you can determine whether activate the real-time feature of this discussion.

three.title: Manage reference at one place
three.content: References are all tracked in one place, attendee can mark references as suspicious and warn others when reference it.

four.title: Archive discussion for future
four.content: Discussion is valuable, it should not flooded away by new content day by day, there should be single place to store these pleasure. When you archive the discussion you can download it as JSON file or store in our database and act as static page for future reference.
